expectations incongruent with stage of growth and development

傷痕與燒傷或其他傷勢

abnormal results of hearing screening test

定向感有異 時/地/人

sign.eng: limited recall of long past events

防止傳播的物資/設備/政策不足

sign.eng: does not follow infection control regimen
overweight: adult BMI 25.0 or more; child BMI 95th percentile or more
underweight: adult BMI 18.5 or less; child BMI 5th percentile or less
